title: Elmstead Woods Walking Route

images.caption: Chislehurst Sports Ground

description: Enjoy a short stroll through Elmstead and Marvel Woods on this easy walk in the London Borough of Bromley . The woods consist of oak, beech and sweet chestnut trees with various footpaths to take you around the site. The Green Chain Walk long distance footpath passes right through the site so there is scope for extending your walk. Heading west will take you to the pretty Beckenham Place Park . In the park you'll find 96 hectares (237 acres) of parkland including ancient woodland, a sensory garden and a Grade II listed mansion. Heading east from the woods will take you to Chislehurst Common. Near here you can also pick up the London Loop and enjoy another woodland stroll in Petts Wood and Foots Cray Meadows .
